AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: apprentice bonewalker creator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always fascinated by the creation process of bonewalkers. Thanks to diligent study, [PAWN_pronoun] was given the chance to join an apprenticeship in Necrom, studying under a master bonewalker creator. Needless to say, [PAWN_nameDef] eagerly accepted the offer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bonewalker creator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent quite some time in the holy city of Necrom, as [PAWN_nameDef] created bonewalkers. Not exactly the most pleasant job, as improper storage of the corpses had somewhat undesirable results.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bonewalker creator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent quite some time in the holy city of Necrom, as [PAWN_nameDef] created bonewalkers. [PAWN_pronoun] always became annoyed when outlanders claimed the art of bonewalker creation was necromancy, and as such should be outlawed. 'Becoming a bonewalker is considered by many Dunmer to be an honour', [PAWN_nameDef] always exasperatedly shouted, though this usually fell on deaf ears. Incidents like this usually left [PAWN_nameDef] a rambling mess for a few days.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: master bonewalker creator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years reading through the texts kept in Necrom, many years studying the corpses sent to be prepared for burial, and many years perfecting the art of bonewalker creation. Needless to say, [PAWN_nameDef] may be one of the most skilled bonewalker creators to have ever existed.\n\nAny bonewalker or bonelord [PAWN_nameDef] creates will be one quality level higher than normal, and will be able to surpass legendary quality.
